title: The Hard Truth About the “Stimulus” Bill (Ep 1422)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the death of the latest outrage from cancel culture, and the fall out from the signing of the “stimulus” bill. 

News Picks: 


President Trump signs the government spending and “stimulus” bills. 


The Axios article about economic productivity, discussed in the show today.

What is GPT-3?


President Trump’s tweet about the China virus drives the liberal media mad.


Nancy Pelosi has some obstacles in front of her as she tries to retain the Speaker post.

More on the Jimmy Galligan story from the show today.

New Yorkers continue to flee for Florida.
